model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Have you decided to get one of my friend's kittens?
I'm thinking about it, but I'm planning on going on vacation in a week so It'd have to be next month
Alright, just keep me posted.  Where are you going on vacation?
Next Thursday, we're going to San Diego. I can't wait to visit the zoo there!
Nice! Have you ever been there before?  How good is their zoo?
Their zoo is pretty good! It's always crowded, of course, but they have pandas so I'm happy. I would say it's bigger than the DC zoo, but I like that the DC zoo has fewer people.
That sounds awesome.  I haven't been to the zoo in so long.  I wish I could go.
You should go with your sister! she can bring her dog. They probably have all kinds of exotic birds...

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Zoo Visit and Favorite Animals', 'Related Summaries': 'Sharing experiences of recent zoo visits and favorite animals at the zoo.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: Cool! Those sound like interesting books for sure. My pet cat always likes to sit on my lap as I read. I actually just went to the zoo this past week! ### Speaker A: What were some of your favorite things to see at the zoo? I went a few years ago and it was a lot of fun. Very crowded, but still fun. ### Speaker B: I love seeing lions the most! I also enjoy pandas and monkeys. Do you have any favorite zoo animals? ### Speaker A: I always really enjoyed seeing some of the exotic birds. Some of them are so colorful and unique looking. They look like an artist drew them and they came to life. ### Speaker B: I totally agree! Those are my girlfriend's favorite things to see at the zoo too. She actually just got a cockatoo! ' }
```
